content: SPX Universal A diamond blade for battery cut-off saws Ultimate diamond blade engineered to last longer and maximize cuts-per-charge and cutting speed with battery-powered cut-off saws in a variety of base materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Maximize productivity – lift the performance of your DSH 600-22 and DSH 700-22 battery cut-off saws to the next level by using diamond blades developed specially for these tools More cuts per charge – the thinner blade core consumes less power when slicing through the base material Smoother cuts – thanks to redesigned, lower-friction diamond segments Higher cutting performance, for longer – Hilti Equidist arranged diamond technology helps to make these some of our most durable and powerful diamond blades Strict quality standards – every diamond segment is laser welded and tested separately before any blade can leave the factory Applications Cutting concrete and masonry – such as making new openings or cutting bricks, blocks and prefab elements to size Maximizing overall tool performance when using DSH 600-22 and DSH 700-22 battery-powered cut-off saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Battery cut-off saw Base material: Masonry, Natural stone, Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Battery cut-off saw | Base material | Masonry, Natural stone, Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) | Product Class | Ultimate | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry ### ITEMS- 2287947 - Dia blade 12x1 SPX univ A - Package Size 1 pc - 2287948 - Dia blade 12x1 (6) SPX univ A - Package Size 6 pc
